elementlist.def: to break (e.g. stick or bone), a loss :: to turn sth over, to turn upside-down, to tip sth out (of a container) :: to break, to fracture, to snap, to suffer loss, to bend, to twist, to turn, to change direction, convinced, to convert into (currency), discount, rebate, tenth (in price), classifier for theatrical scenes, to fold, accounts book :: to fold (a document), to turn, to bend
